Type.Name: FinishedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FinishedHandler(object o, GnomeDb.FinishedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the FinishedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the FinishedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the FinishedHandler is removed from the event.
